mapper.select: SELECT c.mat_ord_no, c.mat_code, m.mat_name, c.mat_in_qty, TO_CHAR(c.mat_chk_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as "MAT_CHK_DATE",l.lot_no, w.wh_code, w.wh_name FROM mat_chk c JOIN mat_buy b ON c.mat_ord_no = b.mat_ord_no JOIN lot l ON l.mat_chk_code = c.mat_chk_code JOIN material m ON m.mat_code = c.mat_code JOIN warehouse w ON w.wh_code = l.wh_code

SELECT o.mat_out_no, o.mat_code, m.mat_name, o.mat_out_qty, TO_CHAR(o.mat_out_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') ,o.wh_code , w.wh_name, o.mat_lot_no FROM mat_out o JOIN material m ON m.mat_code = o.mat_code JOIN warehouse w ON w.wh_code = o.wh_code
SELECT l.lot_no, l.lot_qty, l.wh_code, w.wh_name, l.mp_code , (SELECT m.mat_name FROM material m WHERE l.mp_code=m.mat_code) AS mat_name FROM lot l JOIN warehouse w ON w.wh_code = l.wh_code
